# Tender Announcement: Benchtop Petroleum Test Centrifuge and Accessories
## Solicitation Details
**Reference Number:** cb-344-77902161
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** W0103-249692-B
**Publication Date:** 2024-01-17
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-26T20:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2024-02-26
**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

## Notice Details
**Trade Agreement:** None applicable
**Tendering Procedure:** Open to all prequalified suppliers under SA E60PV-19EQUI
**Competitive Procurement Strategy:** Recommended bidder will be the supplier with the lowest aggregate price who meets the mandatory technical criteria.

## Tender Requirements
The Department of National Defence requires a supplier to provide a benchtop petroleum centrifuge with associated accessories for testing fuel oil samples. The requirement includes:
- One (1) Petroleum Test Centrifuge, 115 V for testing fuel samples in accordance with ASTM D1796 (modified) or D2709
- Six (6) Each Type Centrifuge Tubes
- Twelve (12) of Each Centrifuge Tube Accessory

## Mandatory Technical Criteria
- Maximum Speed: 2200 RPM
- Maximum RCF: 1327 (long); 1170 (short); 865 (pear-shaped)
- Temperature: Ambient to 93°C (200°F)
- Electrical Requirements: 115V 60 Hz 15A
- Display: LCD
- Timer: Programmable with LCD Display
- Temperature Adjustment: Programmable Temperature Controller with LCD Display
- Insulated: Yes
- Chamber: Vented
- Emergency Stop Button: Yes
- Test Methods Compliance: Meets ASTM D1796, D2709 specifications

## Submission Requirements
Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI may submit a bid. Interested suppliers should download the solicitation document and submit a response as per the requirements of the request for supply arrangement.
